website_summaries.verdict: People loved the Asics Gel Contend 5. This running shoe gained fans for becoming highly comfortable and agreeable to wear. The width profiles were welcomed, as were the secure upper and the accommodating underfoot cushioning unit. On the other hand, a handful of consumers who didn’t sit well with the available sizes, claiming that they were smaller than the usual fare.This product is for neutral pronators and those who desire a versatility that accommodates their active lifestyles. Urban adventurers who enjoy road running are also the ones that are most likely going to enjoy the Gel Contend 5.
pros: Those who have tried the Asics Gel Contend 5 generally welcomed the in-shoe feel, stating that it was pleasant to the foot
People appreciated the price of this running shoe
they noted that it was agreeably affordable
The underfoot cushioning given by this product was considered to be comfortable for all-day wear
Consumers noted that the width profiles followed their expectations
they didn’t feel as though the in-shoe experience was too tight or too loose
The weight of the Gel Contend 5 was considered to be light as it didn’t feel as though it weighed down the foot
It is available in a wide fit option
cons: A few individuals claimed that the sizing scheme was smaller than what they were used to

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish shoes - but come up slightly small
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of training shoes that were light but provide good support to foot and arches. These are just job. I'm really pleased with the quality and value but I found that they do come up about half a size too small. I originally bought a size 10.5 UK (which is my usual size) but had to return them and go up to 11.0 UK. This improved the length of the shoe slightly and gave me a wider toe box so much more comfortable - especially for those that need a wider fitting. Arrived quickly and with free returns!
customer_reviews.author: Boshie

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: The trainers were only a little tight but the cushioning was good. My son tried them on and really liked them so he has kept them. Unfortunately, the next size up was not available on Amazon, so I have to listen to him telling me how good they are
customer_reviews.author: John Aird

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and smart
customer_reviews.text: These trainers are very comfy. More of a recreational user than a serious runner they provide plenty of support for me.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer987

customer_reviews.title: Fit and weight are spot on.
customer_reviews.text: A well balanced and lightweight pair of trainers. The gel fill makes them extremely comfortable for road runners on a budget, and to get them for just over £30 was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW RUDD

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: These are OK as a pair of running shoes to walk in. But don't try to run properly. Unresponsive. Heavy. Buy a NB pair for the same price and do better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They got holes on the front in both feet
customer_reviews.text: I only happened with Asics, no other brands, and it is the 3rd pair that has the same outcome. so even though they are very comfy, they don't last long, after 5 months I got the first hole. bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great product, as can be expected, arrived on time and in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High performance!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. He’s very happy with the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half size up, glad I did. They are a little tight.. I had to break them in over week or so but now very happy with them..use them for walking and they do the job fine.
customer_reviews.author: C Sheehan.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great budget running shoe... would buy again plus fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Gareth H.

customer_reviews.title: Great runners!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes, perfect fit and very comfortable to run in
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shoes started to wear through at the big toe after only about 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Appalling quality - the stitching started to fail after about 2 months and the shoes already need replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Contend 5 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Ideal for runners over short distances, the GEL-Contend 5 offers exceptional cushioning and excellent fit. The upper is characterized by a central laminated structure that guarantees support and stability, while the Ortholite insole ensures comfort throughout the day. GEL cushioning system on the heel; Removable Ortholite insole.
